text:
@NYGovCuomo Here's a TOOL we can use against #Coronavirus everywhere. May need to issue UV eyewear public but so what. #FarUV should be placed --> Everywhere! 

Far-UVC light: A new tool to control the spread of airborne-mediated microbial diseases
